channel.title: Forensics on Trevor Saudi
channel.description: Recent content in Forensics on Trevor Saudi

item.title: AfricaHackon 2021 CTF Finals
item.description: My team (fr334aks) and I had the pleasure of taking part in AH2021 CTF finals where we took 3rd out of the ten teams that qualified.

item.title: CyberTalents National CTF
item.description: My team and I recently took place in the CyberTalents National CTF 2021 where we emerged 1st in Kenya :) We managed to solve all challenges but one.

item.title: DownUnderCTF-Tim Tams(Misc)
item.description: Misc challenges are usually random and require logic and lots of patience to solve.

item.title: DownUnderCTF-On the Spectrum(Forensics)
item.description: Recently, I’ve been getting hooked with forensics challenges, this being the second solve I made for the team.

item.title: Habibamod CTF writeup — CyberTalents CTF 2020
item.description: CyberTalents organized a national CTF competition yesterday which my team and I participated and settled for 2nd place.
